full_text: More than 5,000 people were reported to have been arrested in protests across Russia, including Alexei Navalny’s wife, prominent journalists and a popular rapper, Oxxxymiron https://t.co/fjReHY7OKk

localize.full_text: 据报道，俄罗斯各地有5000多人在抗议活动中被捕，其中包括阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的妻子、著名记者和一名受欢迎的说唱歌手Oxxxymiron https://t.co/fjReHY7OKk。
據報道，俄羅斯各地有5000多人在抗議活動中被捕，其中包括阿列克謝-納瓦爾尼的妻子、著名記者和一名受歡迎的說唱歌手Oxxxymiron https://t.co/fjReHY7OKk。
